CustomField.description: In the Late Repayment Tolerance Period you can define a number of days before which no penalties will be applied to an account even if there is a late repayment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In the Late Repayment Tolerance Period you can define a number of days before which no penalties will be applied to an account even if there is a late repayment.
CustomField.label: Late Repayment Tolerance Period (days)
